cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Check our educational series on how to plan and build journeys that help you better guide your customers towards conversion.

series","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"7f0c8151-4cb3-4f31-bd25-218c57d9f065"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"8b294b9a-8a20-4893-8739-9bfa2393cafc","headingLevel":"1041392c-e249-4813-ab4f-125e7f6ab42b","headingLevelsParsed":"919f36f9-2044-4138-96a9-a34db5529d94","headingAlignment":"10828216-b404-40cf-a7bd-46c180b1cf31","headingAlignmentsParsed":"92872d83-d255-464b-88d4-fa6d75d5ca21","showHeadingAnchor":"e5e5f7f2-ddce-48e9-87e0-a55182a59feb","id":"de9ae7e8-c2f4-415e-8724-237f867ba06a"}}]},{"identifier":"a4b72eee-5c6b-404f-bc48-ae094efd433e","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"0dd16fad-115b-401f-8ac3-fa9252bad3c5","properties":{"markdown":"We want to help you understand both the why and the how of customer journeys, so we cover key marketing and sales concepts **and** how customer journeys is designed in Xperience by Kentico, along with the following information.

* An introduction to customer journeys and why they matter.
* A deep dive into the key components that make up an effective journey.
* Practical steps for building journeys that guide leads through your funnel.
* Tips on gathering the right insights from your teams.
* Hands-on demo opportunities to safely explore features in action.

Whether you’re a marketer, content editor, or admin, these materials are designed with you in mind. They break down complex concepts into actionable guidance, making it easier for you to create personalized experiences, boost engagement, and improve conversions.
